reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Big Thumbs Up for this Security System

reviews.comment: This product is excellent with its amazing features. The lack of a monthly fee makes it cost-effective. It's a wireless system that's easy to install. The IP67 Weatherproof feature ensures durability. It offers a clear view with 1080p HD Quality and its 180-Day Battery Life is impressive. The 'Motion Only Alert' and 'Human Detection Technology' add to its reliability. The Night Vision works well. Overall, this product is a great investment. Read more

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great entry level security camera system!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2024
reviews.comment: This system was easy to install and set up. I already had a few devices in the Eufy ecosystem, so adding these was a breeze. I was able to install the cameras in minutes (probably 10-15 minutes each), and after spending a few minutes tweaking the motion detection settings I was up and running.I am pleased with the camera quality and they work well at night and in low light conditions. Viewing the camera feeds with the app is simple and effective. The only unknown right now is battery life for the cameras, so we’ll have to see how that works out.The default configuration is to plug the HomeBase unit directly into your router via Ethernet cable (this is how I did it), but the manual does state that it is possible to connect it using WiFi if desired.This package is built around the HomeBase 2, which is the older version but it does the job. The storage is limited, and not expandable. I could definitely see myself upgrading to HomeBase 3 in the future if I need to increase my digital storage capacity but that is not a high priority for me right now. All in all, I’m very pleased with this and it is working great. Read more

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly Recommend this Security System

reviews.comment: The features of this security product are impressive. The 2-Cam Kit suits my home perfectly and there's no monthly fee. The 180-Day Battery Life and HomeKit Compatibility are convenient and easy to integrate. The standout feature is the Human Detection Technology, which is smart and reliable. I highly recommend this product for anyone needing a good security system. Read more

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great cameras for the price!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2020
reviews.comment: I'll start off by saying I originally bought an Arlo Pro 2 system. Much to my disappointment, the package got 'lost in the mail' so I ended up ordering this camera system by sheer luck. I had been watching several review videos trying to decide between Arlo and Ring since both were on sale via Black Friday when I saw these. The one thing that attracted me to these were the price and NO MONTHLY SUBSCRIPTION FEE!!!!!!Fast forward got it delivered and was very happy with what I got. I received 3 cameras and a base station. Base station is very small and sleek and has great range to to my cameras. Cameras are decently heavy and don't feel cheap. They don't come that charged, so I had to charge them one by one off the base station(which didn't take long).Setup was a breeze. Plugged the base station in, hooked it up to the ol modem via ethernet cable and downloaded the app and followed the setup instructions. It's a pretty straightforward process. Set up an account and the app walks you through the rest of the process step by step. What I liked about the app is you can take your phone over to a spot you want to put a camera and it'll tell you the signal strength; which I found extremely useful and helped to determine where to put my cameras. Installing the cameras took no time at all either.Once the cameras were set up, we did some test runs and everything worked great(at first). The picture quality is great. The night vision is amazing. The microphone is so good I can hear our conversations inside the house. The app was user friendly as well. On a side note, there is a small delay in response time as far as notifications go, but it's not enough to matter. From what I've read, all the brands do. You have to be practical with your expectations too. The camera has to record, send that clip to the base station, then the base station has to download it and get it out to you via the internet. If you want faster response times, I recommend getting a fast internet connection.Finally, this is why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5. After the front door camera was installed, it was super finicky. When we did test runs with it, it worked great. The next day, however, we had received 2 packages and didn't receive notifications. Then we started conducting more test runs and still couldn't get it to work 100%. Frustrated, we finally took the camera down and repositioned it. Since then, we have had zero problems. All 3 cameras work flawlessly. We think the problem was the angle we had it positioned and we had it up a little too high. We moved it down some and centered it on the door and it did the job.If you're trying to decide and are a researcher like I am, go with these cameras. I feel very satisfied with my purchase. They have worked great and are such great deal compared to the other systems out there; especially since there is no monthly subscription fee. If you do decide to buy these, I just recommend installing them between 6 to 8 ft from the ground and you shouldn't have any problems. Read more

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars These work great! No subscription service required
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2025
reviews.comment: We recently purchased these and cant say enough good things about them. The picture is very clear and you can pick up movement from a good distance. We have outside cats and I am able to control settings so it doesn't alert every time they walk by. One of the best things is you don't have to sign up for a subscription service! I simply have the camera alert me in real time so I can watch who is at the house. I can then delete the short video at my convenience. The set up.was really easy. We are an older couple and dread purchasing electronics because set up for us is usually a nightmare and we end up arguing and calling a young person for help. Not this time we walked right through the set up with no issues! Read more

reviews.comment: I’ve been using the Arlo Essential Security Camera 2K (2nd Gen) for a few weeks now, and I’m really impressed. Setup was super simple, and the wireless connection is strong and reliable.I especially like the real-time notifications and the motion detection, which work exactly as expected. The wide-angle lens captures a lot more than I thought it would, and the 2-way audio is clear. It’s great for both indoor and outdoor use, and the spotlight feature adds extra security at night.Overall, this is a high-quality security camera with all the features I was looking for. Highly recommended! Read more

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Incredible Security Camera with Long-Lasting Battery!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2025
reviews.comment: The Arlo Essential XL 2K (2nd Gen) Security Camera is an absolute must-have for home security! It delivers crystal-clear video, smart features, and an extended battery life that makes it stand out from the rest.Why It’s Amazing:✅ Stunning 2K Video Quality – The high-resolution footage captures sharp details day and night, making it easy to see everything clearly.✅ 4X Longer Battery Life – The extra-long battery is a game-changer! It lasts months on a single charge, reducing the hassle of frequent recharging.✅ Color Night Vision & Spotlight – The built-in spotlight ensures bright, full-color images even at night, offering excellent visibility.✅ Completely Wire-Free & Easy Setup – No wires, no stress! The installation took just minutes, and the Arlo app makes everything easy to manage.✅ Instant Motion Alerts – Real-time motion notifications keep me updated, giving peace of mind whether I’m home or away.✅ Two-Way Audio – The built-in microphone and speaker let me talk and listen through the camera, perfect for communicating with visitors or delivery drivers.✅ Weather-Resistant & Durable – Performs flawlessly in rain, heat, and cold, making it ideal for both indoor and outdoor use.Final Verdict:This Arlo Essential XL 2K camera is an outstanding security solution. The wire-free design, long battery life, and powerful features make it a top-tier choice for protecting any home. Highly recommend! 🔒📷 Read more

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great camera!!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2024
reviews.comment: This is such a nice little camera! It was super easy for me to install the app on my phone and set up an account. I don'tlove that you need to pay to have the benefits though. You have the option for a free trail for 30 days. It has the mount and nails to mount it and that was also very easy andstraightforward! It took about 5 minutes to set everything up. It is super sensitive so we toned down the sensitivity because we were getting notifications constantly so that was so nice! It has night vision, sensitivity levels, spot light, and audio settings. It's so nice that we can customize it to what we need. The picture is so clear and the video is even better! It takes little videos that are easy to watch and easy to delete if you don't want them. I do wish that it could swivel but it only goes side to side not up and down. It's nice too that you can recharge it. I've had it going for 3 days and it's at 75% battery! It uses the common iPhone charger so l don't need a special one. It took about 1.5 hours to charge it when I got it out of the box. It's such a great little security camera and I love how easy the app is to use!! Read more

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2025
reviews.comment: The Arlo security camera is a very popular choice for those looking for an effective and easy-to-use home monitoring solution. This system features its wireless design, making it easy to install anywhere without the need for complicated cables. Additionally, its high-definition (HD) video quality allows for clear images, even in low-light conditions, thanks to its night vision.One of the standout features of Arlo cameras is their connectivity through the Arlo app, which offers full control from your smartphone, allowing you to view cameras in real time, receive alerts, and review past recordings. Additionally, the system is compatible with voice assistants such as Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant, further enhancing its integration into your smart home.In terms of security, Arlo cameras are highly reliable, offering cloud recordings and secure storage. Depending on the model, some cameras also include smart alerts, motion and sound detection, improving the response to potential intruders. Read more

amazon.Title: Arlo Essential Security Camera 2K | Indoor - Outdoor | 2nd Gen | Wireless with Spotlight, 2-Way Audio, Color Night Vision, Live Stream, Motion Activation, Real Time Notifications, Wide Angle - White
amazon.Description: Essential Outdoor Camera provides smart home security with crystal-clear 2K resolution. Zoom in 12x to see license plates and eye color in detail, perfect for home security. Get alerts and watch live video from your security camera on your phone. This wireless security camera lets you ward off intruders with the Integrated Spotlight, or with the Integrated Siren by triggering it automatically or manually from the Arlo Secure App. Identify details in low light with Color Night Vision and hear and speak clearly with visitors with noise-canceling audio. Set it up in minutes by connecting directly to Wi-Fi. Install these outdoor security cameras with full confidence thanks to their rechargeable battery and weather-resistant design. An Arlo Secure plan trial is included. After trial, a paid plan is required to keep premium features like 60-day video cloud storage, People, Package, Vehicle Detection, 24/7 Emergency Response, and more. This camera compatible with Arlo SmartHubs/BaseStations but is not yet compatible with Apple Home. This camera is for use in US only. However, you will be able to access and control your camera remotely from anywhere with the Arlo Secure App. Disclaimer: ¹Requires an Arlo Secure paid subscription after the trial period, and some Arlo Secure services may be unavailable in certain regions. For current information on features that need a paid subscription, visit arlo.com/arlosecure.
